alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:44AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
